selectedVerses.text: For an overseer, as God's steward, must be above reproach. He must not be arrogant or quick-tempered or a drunkard or violent or greedy for gain,
And Jonathan called after the boy, "Hurry! Be quick! Do not stay!" So Jonathan's boy gathered up the arrows and came to his master.
Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger;
Be not quick in your spirit to become angry, for anger lodges in the bosom of fools.
And Abraham went quickly into the tent to Sarah and said, "Quick! Three seahs of fine flour! Knead it, and make cakes."
